headline: Mama's Texas-Style Peach Cobbler
name: Mama's Texas-Style Peach Cobbler
description: Make this Texas-style peach cobbler in an oven-safe bowl with a big can of cling peaches in heavy syrup. It's a very traditional Southern comfort food.
recipeIngredient: 1 (28 ounce) can sliced cling peaches in heavy syrup

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Combine self-rising flour and sugar in a bowl; stir in milk.
Pour melted butter into an oven-safe bowl; pour flour mixture on top. Layer peaches in heavy syrup on top. Do not stir.
Bake in the preheated oven until peaches are bubbly and crust is lightly browned, 50 to 60 minutes.
